titles: To the memory, of the incomparable Sir Andrevv Ramsey of Abbots-Hall. Provost of Edinburgh, counsellor to His Majesty, Lord of the Session, &c. Who departed thi life, January 17. 1688. A funeral elegie. / N. Paterson.
author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Ramsay, Andrew, --  Sir, d. 1688 --  Death and burial --  Poetry.
Elegiac poetry, Scottish --  Early works to 1800.
